summary: Adds Spells and other items to give the mage class a god like feel to it
descriptionHtml:
Hi guys this would be my second mod for Skyrim and is actually a companion to my first Starting Weapons and Cheat Armor.  This is soley geared towards the Mage or magical class as those items were lacking in my first one.

This adds a dead Battlemage on the road from Riverwood to Whiterun he has all the items on him and a nice backstory as well.   

this mods adds several spells as well as a few items with overpowered enchants to the game.
author: infiltratingsun
